What is the difference between EDP and EDT?

EDP (Eau de Parfum) has a higher concentration of perfume oils, typically 15-20%, making it last longer than EDT (Eau de Toilette), which usually has 5-15% concentration. EDP is often more intense, while EDT is lighter and better suited for daily wear.
